title: Tree Planting Event
content: Organize an event, where people plant new trees and clean up garbage from their neighbourhoods

title: IT Company
content: Support a small scale IT firm specialized in algorithms that balance production and usage of electricity produced by solar panels.

title: Support a new app
content: Support an app that offers all key information on public / shared modes of transportation in order to reduce the carbon foot print in your daily home to work commute

title: Energy Cooperation
content: Start an energy cooperation to facilitate other people who want to start their own energy projects.

title: Energy Storage
content: Create a local energy storage system to be able to be less dependent on the grid.

title: Car Free Streets
content: Push legislation and gather supporters to promote car free streets

title: Solar Panels on Houses
content: Start a neighborhood initiative to collectively install solar panels on rooftops.

title: Solar Panels in Schools
content: Convince the teachers and director of a school to install solar panels on the roof to cover the building’s energy needs.

title: Thermostats
content: Support a start-up company to develop a new type of thermostat that can connect to people’s smart meters and their smartphones.

title: Electric Vehicles
content: Propose tax reduction on electric vehicles

title: Community Gardening
content: Set up a new community garden

title: Small Festival
content: Organize a small multicultural festival in the area

title: Bike Sharing
content: Support a new bike sharing innitiative.

title: Alternative Tours
content: Set up alternative tours for tourists who come to see the everyday Paris

title: High-Speed Internet
content: Set-up a hub for a new high-speed internet connection in the region.

title: Accessibility for Disabled Citizens
content: Push legislation and gather supporters to promote better access to the metro for people with disabilities

title: Refugees Welcome
content: Organize a refugee support event

title: Women's March
content: Organize a march in support of women's rights

title: Christmas Market
content: Approve a christmas market

title: Funfair
content: Organize a funfair in the area.

title: Co-Working Spaces
content: Support a new hub / co-working space for local artist

title: Local Products
content: Push legislation and gather supporters to promote local products

title: Collaborative Practices
content: Support collaborative practices in mid-sized businesses / shops

title: Automated Lights
content: Support a company to offer smart lighting solutions to allow people to control and automate lighting systems in their house through an app.

title: High tech production
content: A new hub for high tech startups

title: Solar Panel Factory
content: A new highly optimized solar panel production plant

title: New Recycling Plant
content: A new automated recycling plant

title: Old Factory - New Purpose
content: Reestablishing an old factory as a new hub for startups and events

title: Grand Mall
content: Approve a new super modern office building and mall

title: Financial District
content: Approve the construction of a super modern financial district
